param.name: riid
param.para: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the requested interface type.

param.name: ppDebug
param.para: A pointer to a buffer that receives a pointer to the debugging interface.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise. For a list of error codes, see DXGI_ERROR.

remarks.para: To access DXGIGetDebugInterface, call the function to get Dxgidebug.dll and the function to get the address of DXGIGetDebugInterface.Windows 8.1: Starting in Windows 8.1, Windows Store apps call the function to get an interface.
Note This API requires the Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.
